subject: Verify Your Email Address
body:
Hello,

Thank you for registering with {{project_title}}! To complete your registration, please verify your email address by entering the following One-Time Password (OTP):

{{verification_code}}

This OTP is valid for 10 minutes, so we recommend verifying your account right away to start exploring {{project_title}}.

If you did not attempt to register for a {{project_title}} account, please ignore this email.

For any assistance, feel free to reach out to us at {{support_email}}.

With regards,
The {{project_title}} Team
